headline: BMY Declares $0.60 Dividend, Extends 95-Year Streak
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb Company (NYSE:BMY) is the third biopharmaceutical company on the list of the 10 undervalued blue chip stocks analysts recommend for smart investing. On June 17, the company announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.60 per share on its common stock. This is the 95th consecutive year that the conglomerate has paid a dividend. […]
